Up.Statement: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_ShopShipping' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'fixed_purchase_first_shipping_next_month_flg') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_ShopShipping ADD fixed_purchase_first_shipping_next_month_flg NVARCHAR(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N'0'); END GO
